# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (sap hr) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.contract_dim)
- **New Data:** where a workc in the source does not exist as an ContractCode in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on workc in source and ContractCode in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'

## View contract_dim_new is created

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW contract_grouped

    AS

SELECT  WorkC as ContractCode,
        First(Work_Contract) as Description, 
        CASE 
            WHEN CT IS NULL
            THEN 'N/A'
            ELSE CT
        END as ContractTypeCode,
        First(Contract_Type) as ContractType,
        last(expected_from) AS expected_from
    
       
FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr
WHERE WorkC IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY WorkC, CT;

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW contract_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.ContractCode IS NULL
        THEN T7.ContractID
        ELSE NULL
    END as ContractID, 
    T1.ContractCode,
    T1.Description,
    T1.ContractTypeCode,
    T1.ContractType,
    T2.SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from) AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.ContractCode,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.Description,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.ContractTypeCode,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.ContractType,'.'))) AS RowID,
    'Y' AS IsActive,
    T7.IsActive AS HistoricIsActive

FROM contract_grouped T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_contract_dim T7 ON T1.ContractCode = T7.ContractCode AND
                                                T1.ContractTypeCode = T7.ContractTypeCode AND 
                                                T7.IsActive = 'Y'     
WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    CASE
        WHEN T1.ContractCode = T7.ContractCode AND
            T1.ContractTypeCode = T7.ContractTypeCode
            AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.ContractCode,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Description,'.'), IFNULL(T1.ContractTypeCode,'.'), IFNULL(T1.ContractType,'.'))) <> T7.RowID   -- same employee, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T7.ContractCode IS NULL -- new contract code
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y'

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **contract_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View contract_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW contract_dim_changed_rows

    AS

Select 
    ContractID,
    ContractCode,
    Description,
    ContractTypeCode,
    ContractType,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From contract_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

SELECT
    T1.ContractID,
    T1.ContractCode,
    T1.Description,
    T1.ContractTypeCode,
    T1.ContractType,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_contract_dim T1
INNER JOIN contract_dim_new T2 ON T1.ContractCode = T2.ContractCode AND T1.ContractTypeCode = T2.ContractTypeCode 
AND T2.ContractID IS NULL AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
;

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM contract_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW contract_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    T1.ContractID,
    T1.ContractCode,
    T1.Description,
    T1.ContractTypeCode,
    T1.ContractType,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM contract_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View contract_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. workc from SAPHR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.contract_dim is updated

%%sql

-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_contract_dim AS Target
USING contract_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.ContractID = Target.ContractID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'
        
-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (ContractID,
        ContractCode,
        Description,
        ContractTypeCode,
        ContractType,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.ContractID,
        Source.ContractCode,
        Source.Description,
        Source.ContractTypeCode,
        Source.ContractType,
        Source.SourceSystemID,
        Source.IngestionDate,
        Source.ValidTo,
        Source.RowID,
        Source.IsActive)

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.contract_dim is updated

%%sql

-- Insert new ContractID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.hr_contract_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ContractID NULLS LAST) AS ContractID,
    ContractCode,
    Description,
    ContractTypeCode,
    ContractType,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_contract_dim;
